attributes.action: Release all information on our military operations abroad on a weekly basis.
attributes.additional_details:
We want updates of any buildings destroyed in the process. And when our operations do lead to civilian death, we want information of what went wrong i.e bad Intel. 

We want a break down of how much money we have spent in the process, broken down and itemised. I.e. how much each missile/bomb cost, wages of those taking part in action, fighter jet running costs. 

If our operations are 100% honourable, then there is no reason for our actions to not be transparent for the world to see.
attributes.background:
I believe if we as a democratic country decide to bomb another. Then we the people should have the right to be constantly updated on our operations. 

We want weekly updates on how many bombs have been dropped. How many ISIS militants died and how many civilians were killed in the process.
